sourcesContent:
import '../styles/tour-details.css' import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" import Booking from '../components/Booking/Booking' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import useFetch from './../hooks/useFetch' import { BASE_URL } from './../utils/config' const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams() const reviewMsgRef = useRef("") const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null) // Fetch data from the database const { data: tour, error, loading } = useFetch(`${BASE_URL}/tours/${id}`) // If data is still loading or there's an error if (loading) return

Loading...

if (error) return

Error: {error}

if (!tour) return

No tour details available

const { photo, title, desc, price, reviews, address, city, distance, maxGroupSize } = tour || {} const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews) const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" } const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault() const reviewText = reviewMsgRef.current.value // Handle review submission logic } return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ({reviews?.length})} {address}
{city} ${price} /per person {distance} km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/*============== tour review section ============== */}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}>1 setTourRating(2)}>2 setTourRating(3)}>3 setTourRating(4)}>4 setTourRating(5)}>5
{reviews?.map((review, index) => (
Pranta

{new Date("12-1-2024").toLocaleDateString("en-US", options)}

5
Amazing tour
))}
{/*============== tour review section end ============== */}
) } export default TourDetails
